subject: Horse Racing
Big Brown (Race Horse)
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Preakness Stakes
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: The colt’s trainer revealed on Sunday that the undefeated Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner had sustained a quarter crack on the inside of his left front hoof.
snippet: The colt’s trainer revealed on Sunday that the undefeated Kentucky Derby and Preakness winner had sustained a quarter crack on the inside of his left front hoof.
